verses.verse: And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H834>steward<s%> <S%H5921><s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4390>Fill<s%> the <S%H582>men's<s%> <S%H572>sacks<s%> with <S%H400>food,<s%> as <S%H834>much<s%> as they <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H5375>carry,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in his <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

And <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H1375>cup,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H1375>cup,<s%> in the <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6996>youngest,<s%> and his <S%H7668>corn<s%> <S%H3701>money.<s%> And he <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>
As soon as the <S%H1242>morning<s%> was <S%H216>light,<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H7971>sent<s%> away, they and their <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And when they were <S%H3318>gone<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and not yet <S%H7368>far<s%> off, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H834>steward,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> Up, <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H582>men;<s%> and when you do <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them, <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H7999>rewarded<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good?<s%>

Is not <S%H2088>this<s%> it in <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H8354>drinks,<s%> and whereby indeed he <S%H5172>divines?<s%> you have done <S%H7489>evil<s%> in <S%H834>so<s%> <S%H6213>doing.<s%>
And he <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them, and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them <S%H411>these<s%> same <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words?<s%> God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that your <S%H5650>servants<s%> should <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing:<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H4672>found<s%> in our sacks' <S%H572><s%><S%H6310>mouths,<s%> we <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> then should we <S%H1589>steal<s%> out of your <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2091>gold?<s%>
With <S%H834>whomsoever<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants<s%> it be <S%H4672>found,<s%> both let him <S%H4191>die,<s%> and we <S%H1571>also<s%> will be my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H5650>slaves.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> let it be according to your <S%H1697>words:<s%> he with <S%H834>whom<s%> it is <S%H4672>found<s%> shall be my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and you shall be <S%H5355>blameless.<s%>

Then they <S%H4116>speedily<s%> <S%H3381>took<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H572>sack<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H572>sack.<s%>

And he <S%H2664>searched,<s%> and <S%H2490>began<s%> at the <S%H1419>oldest,<s%> and <S%H3615>left<s%> at the <S%H6996>youngest:<s%> and the <S%H1375>cup<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H572>sack.<s%>
Then they <S%H7167>rent<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H6006>laded<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> for he was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H4639>deed<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done?<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> you not that such a <S%H376>man<s%> as I can certainly <S%H5172>divine?<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H559>say<s%> to my <S%H113>lord?<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H1696>speak?<s%> or <S%H4100>how<s%> shall we <S%H6663>clear<s%> ourselves? <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> out the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we are my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> we, and he <S%H1571>also<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>so:<s%> but the <S%H376>man<s%> in whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found,<s%> he shall be my <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and as for you, <S%H5927>get<s%> you up in <S%H7965>peace<s%> to your <S%H1>father.<s%>

Then <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> let your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H241>ears,<s%> and let not your <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burn<s%> against your <S%H5650>servant:<s%> for you are even as <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3426>Have<s%> you a <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H251>brother?<s%>

And we <S%H559>said<s%> to my <S%H113>lord,<s%> We <S%H3426>have<s%> a <S%H1>father,<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and a <S%H3206>child<s%> of his <S%H2208>old<s%> age, a <S%H6996>little<s%> one; and his <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and he <S%H905>alone<s%> is <S%H3498>left<s%> of his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> him.
And you <S%H559>said<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3381>Bring<s%> him <S%H3381>down<s%> to me, that I may <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on him.

And we <S%H559>said<s%> to my <S%H113>lord,<s%> The <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> for if he should <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> his father would <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And you <S%H559>said<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H518>Except<s%> <S%H3808><s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with you, you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H3588>when<s%> we <S%H5927>came<s%> up to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> we <S%H5046>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H113>lord.<s%>
And our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>Go<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food.<s%>

And we <S%H559>said,<s%> We <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> be with us, then will we <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down:<s%> for we <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H369>except<s%> our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> be with us.
And your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to us, You <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> me <S%H8147>two<s%> sons:
And the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from me, and I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> he is <S%H2963>torn<s%> in pieces; and I <S%H7200>saw<s%> him not <S%H2008>since:<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> from me, and <S%H611>mischief<s%> <S%H7136>befall<s%> him, you shall <S%H3381>bring<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> my <S%H7872>gray<s%> hairs with <S%H7451>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore when I <S%H935>come<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> be not with us; seeing that his <S%H5315>life<s%> is <S%H7194>bound<s%> up in the <S%H5288>lad's<s%> <S%H5315>life;<s%>

It shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> that the <S%H5288>lad<s%> is not with us, that he will <S%H4191>die:<s%> and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H3381>bring<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H7872>gray<s%> hairs of your <S%H5650>servant<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>

For your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6148>became<s%> <S%H6148>surety<s%> for the <S%H5288>lad<s%> to my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> him not to you, then I shall <S%H2398>bear<s%> the <S%H2398>blame<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%> for <S%H3605>ever.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, let your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad<s%> a <S%H5650>slave<s%> to my <S%H113>lord;<s%> and let the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up with his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

For <S%H349>how<s%> shall I <S%H5927>go<s%> up to my <S%H1>father,<s%> and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> be not with me? <S%H6435>lest<s%> peradventure I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that shall <S%H4672>come<s%> on my <S%H1>father.<s%>
